table.name: Sigil General Encounters
table.caption: Sigil General Encounters
rows: 1 {@creature noble} pedestrian distractedly talking to 1 {@creature cranium rat squeaker|MPP}*
1 {@creature scout} tumbling through a portal from the Material Plane
{@dice 1d4} {@creature Nightmare||nightmares} recklessly pulling a sedan chair
{@dice 1d4} {@creature Society of Sensation Muse|MPP|Society of Sensation muses}*
{@dice 1d4} {@creature Cranium Rat Squeaker Swarm|MPP|cranium rat squeaker swarms}*
1 {@creature Heralds of Dust Remnant|MPP|Herald of Dust remnant}* and {@dice 1d4} {@creature Zombie||zombies} collecting bodies
1 {@creature Mind's Eye matter smith|MPP}* carrying a rare gizmo
{@dice 1d8} {@creature Bleak Cabal Void Soother|MPP|Bleak Cabal void soothers}* assisting locals
{@dice 1d6} {@creature Transcendent Order Instinct|MPP|Transcendent Order instincts}* parkouring through the crowd
1 {@creature bone devil} late for a meeting
1 {@creature mage} who's overwhelmed, having just arrived from the Material Plane
{@dice 1d4} {@creature Mercykiller Bloodhound|MPP|Mercykiller bloodhounds}* tracking a criminal
1 {@creature cuprilach rilmani|MPP}* spying on a target
{@dice 1d4} {@creature Cloud Giant||cloud giants} who've become lost
1 {@creature aboleth} in an aquarium sedan chair
A famous {@creature archmage}, like Bigby, Evard, Mordenkainen, or Tasha
The Lady of Pain and {@dice 2d4} {@creature dabus|MPP}*
footnotes: Creatures marked with an asterisk (*) appear in {@book Morte's Planar Parade|MPP}, while the rest are described in the {@book Monster Manual|MM}. Most creatures are initially indifferent to characters.
